hanzi-su-wiki:
佳

Значения

Хороший, приятный, счастливый

Мнемоника

Справа — скипетр на право пользования землей. Общий смысл — качества заслуживающие награды — земли и рабов 亻.
purpleculture_pinyin:
jiā
beautiful; fine; good
красивая; отлично; хороший
rtega_mnemonic:
佳佳RSgood, auspicious, beautiful, delightful
  • person 亻 possessing many beautiful jade tablets 圭: he's worked good and is auspicious
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 圭 indicates the sound; 亻 (person) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
最佳 [ zuì jiā ]: optimum; optimal; peak; best (athlete, movie etc)
佳节 [ jiā jié ]: festive day; holiday
佳绩 [ jiā jì ]: good result; success
佳作 [ jiā zuò ]: masterpiece; fine piece of writing
佳话 [ jiā huà ]: story or deed that captures the imagination and is spread far and wide

heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T wants to go to a superb school, so he enrolls in Harvard, an ivy -league school.
heisig_constituent: excellent, person, ivy, square jewel, soil, dirt, ground, soil2, dirt2, ground2
heisig_story: Person . . . ivy. To distinguish from excel (Frame 980), eminent (Frame 52), esteem (Frame 196), and exquisite (Frame 130), give the key word its own unique connotation.
koohiiStory1: Mr T wants to go to an excellent school, so he enrolls in Harvard, an ivy-league school.
koohiiStory2: Bill and Ted are walking through medieval Europe when they see a humongous square jewel. "Excellent!" they both yell. But only after grabbing it do they realize it is chained to the neck of Mr. T, who grimaces angrily at them. "Bogus!" they cry, and totally run away.
jp_example_words: 佳句(かく): beautiful passage of literature
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A leader gets double the dirt to build on if he's the most excellent and most skilled of all the leaders. You don't think dirt is so great? Well what if I took the dirt you own away from you? Your house is on that dirt. It's mine now. Get outta here.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine being so excellent at leading, that you get double the dirt that everyone else gets.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This excellent leader is going to use all this dirt to store her excellent cars (か)! Excellent people have to have cars in equal or greater than excellent-ness than themselves.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine your own car. Is it as excellent as you?

humanum_full_description_en:
From " people " to " gui " sound. The original meaning is beautiful. "Said Wen": "Good, good. From people, Guisheng." Such as "Chu Ci. Chapter Nine. "Sorrowful Return to the Wind": "Only the beauty of a beautiful woman is alone in her arms, and it is like a hot pepper." Xiuwu": "Many cheeks and white teeth, good shape and good bones, those who don't wait for the powder and the sex, Xishi, Yangwen also"

" Good " also expresses appreciation and affection. For example, Lu Guimeng of the Tang Dynasty "After the Book of Li He's Xiao Biography": "I made Ji Cao anxious, but Dongye's behavior was not good." Su Shunqing of the Northern Song Dynasty "Han Sanye Ouyang Jiu's work": "Han Zi is good for me. , Chengnan visits Uncle Yong, we can be blinded."
humanum_short_description_en: From " people " to " gui " sound. The original meaning is beautiful.
humanum_full_description:
從「人」，「圭」聲。本義是美好。《說文》：「佳，善也。从人，圭聲。」如《楚辭．九章．悲回風》：「惟佳人之獨懷兮，折若椒以自處。」《淮南子．脩務》：「曼頰皓齒，形夸骨佳，不待脂粉芳澤而性可說者，西施、陽文也」

　　「佳」亦表示贊賞、喜愛。如唐代陸龜蒙〈書李賀小傳後〉：「令季操卞急，不佳東野之為。」北宋蘇舜卿〈和韓三謁歐陽九之作〉：「韓子我所佳，招我懃有謂，城南訪永叔，共可豁蒙蔽。」

For example, Lu Guimeng of the Tang Dynasty "After the Book of Li He's Xiao Biography": "I made Ji Cao anxious, but Dongye's behavior was not good." 佳字的基本解释

佳
jiā
美，好的：佳美。佳妙。佳句。佳作。佳音。佳节。佳境。佳期。佳人。佳丽（ａ．美丽；ｂ．美女）。佳偶。佳酿。美酒佳肴。
好美

佳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiā］
［《廣韻》古膎切，平佳，見。］
［《集韻》居牙切，平麻，見。］
(1)美，美丽。
(2)好，令人满意。
(3)赞赏；喜爱。
(4)姓。明有佳正。见《沂州志》。

佳字的英文翻译

◎ 佳
beautiful, fine, good

佳字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　佳； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页100第18
【唐韻】古膎切【集韻】【韻會】居膎切，?音街。美也，好也。【世說】司馬?畏謹，有以人物問者，每言輒佳。妻責?無別，?曰：如汝言亦復佳。　又【韻補】叶堅溪切，音稽。【揚雄·反騷】閨中容競綽約兮，相態以麗佳。知衆嫭之嫉妒兮，何必颺累之蛾眉。　又叶居何切，音歌。【白居易詩】坐愁今夜醒，其奈秋懷何。有客忽叩門，語言亦何佳。

佳字的源字形

佳字的起名意思

：美，好的，形容长相标致，美丽出众，也指善良，美丽，吉祥之义。如佳丽，佳节，佳人。

jiā
1) прекрасный, красивый; превосходный, отличный, наилучший; вежл., эпист. Ваш
佳肴 деликатес
2) благоприятный, счастливый; благодатный; своевременный
佳雨 благодатный (своевременный) дождь
Radicals: ｲ, 土  (leader, dirt)
Meaning Mnemonic
A leader gets double the dirt to build on if he's the most excellent and most skilled of all the leaders. You don't think dirt is so great? Well what if I took the dirt you own away from you? Your house is on that dirt. It's mine now. Get outta here.
Imagine being so excellent at leading, that you get double the dirt that everyone else gets.
Reading Mnemonic
This excellent leader is going to use all this dirt to store her excellent cars (か)! Excellent people have to have cars in equal or greater than excellent-ness than themselves.
Imagine your own car. Is it as excellent as you?
